content.rendered:
COBALT COLOR TREND

Is it just me or did Summer just end in the blink of an eye? In Los Angeles, we don’t get to experience too many seasonal changes, but the weather is getting a bit cooler so I’m excited to stock up on cute sweaters and hoodies. It’s also Halloween!! I’m wishing everyone a very fun, spooky, and safe Halloween! Who’s up for binge watching horror movies? I know I am! I love scary movies.

Moving on to fashion….I’m loving this beautiful cobalt color trend for Fall and winter. What better way to beat the winter blues than by adding this stunning color to your wardrobe. If you love fashion trends and love this color I recommend going head to toe blue like the first look. This look is guaranteed to turn heads..in a good way! The blue sweater with the blue metallic jeans will keep you warm and cozy while still looking on-trend. Or go for this cobalt metallic dress for your next holiday party or a New Year’s Eve party.

The blue dress look is Saint Laurent from FWRD.COM. The top look sweater and jeans are RTA also from FWRD.COM. All items in this post can be found on FWRD.COM and on most major luxury fashion retailers. Top bag is Givenchy and the bottom tote is OFF-WHITE. Blue sneakers are from Balenciaga and the sunglasses are from Acne Studios.

P.S. Let’s book those lash extensions appointments early during the busy holiday season! For appointments – Click Here (By Appointment Only). Shop D’Lashes Beauty and A-List Strip Lashes Here. 

XO XO, DIONNE
